name: Normalize
short-desc: Makes the Pokemon's moves all act normal-type.
long-desc: This Pokemon's moves all act as if they were normal-type.  Moves that inflict typeless damage do so as usual.  Moves of variable type, such as , are affected.  They otherwise work as usual, however; , for example, is always forced to be Normal, but it still has doubled power and looks different during weather.  As  is prevented by immunities, unlike most non-damaging moves, it does not affect ghost-type Pokemon under the effect of this ability.
